reviews.review_text: the formula for the tablets has changed since last year and they don't dissolve as well as they used to but it still helps to keep toilet bowls cleaner than they would without them

This does NOT make your water blue. However, it does make bubbles every time you flush, much like urine bubbles that don't go down. it does help to keep the toilet clean. (Less scrubbing). Each tablet lasts about 2 weeks (for me). It depends on how many people in your household. The instructions says don't handle tablet with bare hands, yet the packaging is difficult to open. Either wear gloves when tearing open the pouch or use scissors to cut open the pouch first. Tearing it open is not that easy.

reviews.title: Where's the Bleach?
reviews.review_text: The price was great, about half the cost of my usual Clorox. When I opened the wrapper, there was no hint of bleach smell; within a week the bowl was dirty again and the tablet had become a tiny puddle of gel. We've never had issues with Great Value products, but this one didn't work for us.

reviews.title: horrible product
reviews.review_text: horrible product, it only smells to bleach for like 3 flushes , it stop smelling or doing anything . I got curious of why it stopped working just to see a giant swollen sticky thing in the bottom of the tank, I pull it out , (wich was very gross) and I noticed it didn't smell to anything just like plastic, I just throw it in the trash and the new ones too. I guess I should had pay a little more and buy the authentic bleach tablets from the original brand

reviews.title: Goop and mold
reviews.review_text: These are terrible!! I've purchased numerous Grear Value brands before and they're normally comparable to name brand, but these are GARBAGE! I deep cleaned all our toilets (we have 3) and added one of these “tablets” After a couple hours and flushing, the water would be foamy. Over a week, the “tablet” in the tank turned into a pile of goop. Mold began to accumulate inside the bowl! I just cleaned the toilets literally only a week ago! I had been an avid user of the Clorox Bleach tablets and will definitely be going back. The only time I would get mold in the toilet is when the tablet ran out. Save your money.

reviews.title: BE WARNED!
reviews.review_text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS! It turns into a gelatinous goo in your tank. It caused so many issues it was unbelievable. My husband was able to fix the problems (in all three toilets!) but what about people who aren't handy? Plumbers must love products like this! Walmart was out of the Clorox brand so I bought these. I won't use products like this ever again after doing a quick web search and seeing how bad all of them are for toilets.

reviews.title: Horrible!
reviews.review_text: Horrible, horrible product. Becomes a blob in the toilet tank that I had to fish out of 2 tanks. Mold started to form in my tank 2 days after dropping these in. There isn't even the faintest smell of bleach. Zero cleaning power. Total waste of money. Read the other negative reviews. Stick with the well known brand for bleach tablets.

reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK

reviews.title: Complete Mess!

reviews.title: Terrible product—don't waste your money

It doesn't dissolve like the old tablets used to—the best way I can describe how it looked after a couple of days was like it was melting. It disappeared quickly and did nothing to help clean the toilet. It's worthless and I will be purchasing a different brand from now on.

reviews.title: FAKE!

reviews.title: Garbage

reviews.title: Waste Of Money

Used to use them all the time, but now they just turn into a blob in your tank that sits there and does nothing. Cleaning action stopped after a few days at best. After a week I tried stirring up the blob only to find it stuck to the bottom of the tank. And the gel gets under the flapper and causes issues. I'm going to have to drain the tank and scrub the rest of it out. Complete waste of money.

reviews.title: Formula changed! These are HORRIBLE!
reviews.review_text: I have bought the great value brand toilet tabs for years on end, and they have been great functionally as well as being a better price point than the name brands. I purchased a new box several weeks ago and realized the box looks the same but the content packaging and size of the tablets has changed. They are most definitely NOT the same product I've always received. Skip to today when I realized the toilets in the house were already starting to have a film and form rings. This only ever used to happen when the tablet dissolved completely. Now it's happening before it's dissolved, AND it is creating cloudy water in the tank and bubbles as it flushes. I noticed that a couple weeks ago and was confused but at the time didn't connect the two. The formula HAS TO GO BACK TO THE OLD FORMULA. THESE ARE ABSOLUTE TRASH! I will be looking elsewhere for these now. Absolutely the worst product change I have ever witnessed with my own eyes! They do not work anymore!

The toilet bowl is dirty when the milky puddle is still in the water tank. What a waste of money. Great Value's bleach tablets used to be good. Then they went away for a while, at least from our store, and when they returned the product seems to have changed.

They crumble from the pack and dissolve almost instantly. No bleach smell whatsoever. At first, I thought I just got a bad batch because I ordered online and received them via shipping. That was about a month ago. So, I decided to go in-store to pick up a box. It's the same crumby crud! I guess they changed manufacturers or something. Walmart, if you did, please go back to your original maker of these because they are absolutely trash now.

reviews.title: Save your money
reviews.review_text: I was trying to save money, so I decided to try the great value brand of toilet bowl, bleach tablets. They say they have a gel action in the tank, they look like a jellyfish in the tank. Unfortunately, the bowl water looks unclean ither than there are a few bubbles on the surface of the water after you flush. reviews.title: Formulation has changed, no longer effective
reviews.review_text: Have been using this product for years and years. More than a decade. As many others have written, Walmart recently changed this product, but the packaging is the same. Used to be a pressed cake of a powder type product. Lasted 2-3 months and did a great job. It would slowly dissolve and shrink to a smaller and smaller puck. In the past few months, it is now a different chemical makeup, slightly different shape and is more a crystalline puck which turns into a blobby mound. And does not last nearly as long, which means your bowl starts to get dirty much faster. I can't imagine why anyone would continue to use this product, having experienced the effectiveness of the prior. With all these one star ratings, you'd think Walmart would want to fix this mistake but who knows. We're changing to Clorox, which I believe is a slightly smaller puck, at a higher price unfortunately...but at least it works! Also, don't know if it's a coincidence but some of the rubber and plastic parts in the the flapper/valve assembly have disintegrated substantially. Even the tube which provides the water fill has become gummy, semi-melted, and it doesn't even sit in the water! I have a feeling there's some nasty chemical(s) in this new formulation which are particularly corrosive to rubber and or vinyl plastics. So not only less effective but potentially destroying the parts inside the tank, including the gaskets! Get ready for a leak!

It is also instructed to only use the tablets in toilets used daily. I will say these toilet bowl cleaner tablets are bigger than other tablets I've used. There is no strong scent of bleach, which I'm honestly thankful for because a strong bleach scent can give me a headache. So far, I feel these are working in keeping my toilet bowl clean between deep cleanings. I do see a lot of bubbles in the toilet water after each flush, as I would with other toilet bowl cleaner tablets. As for the tablet itself, it seems to be dissolving at a good rate, which I hope means it will last at least a month or two. So far, I feel the Great Value Toilet Bowl Cleaner Tablets work well at keeping my toilet bowl cleaned longer between deep cleanings. For that reason, I do recommend the Great Value Toilet Bowl Cleaner Tablets with bleaching action.

reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
reviews.review_text: I've been using this and similar products for many years and am aware of how they normally work. I have to agree with other folks that this product has been reformulated or changed and is no longer effective. Normally, when you drop a fresh tablet into a tank, you get an initial stiff dose of chlorine smell from it, before it settles down to a steady, low dose. Not this time. And it has had no effect in keeping bacterial growth in check. A 'normal' tablet remains solid and gradually shrinks in size as the material slowly dissolves. This batch quickly dissolves into a semi-crystalline blob of mush. I found this out when I lifted the tank lid to see why the fill was running on. The flapper had warped and wouldn't seal. Admittedly, the flapper was very old, an easy fix and everyone says this can happen with cleaner tablets, but the timing struck me as odd. Bottom line: 'Bleaching Action' is not the same as actual chlorine bleach in these products. This formulation relies on borax and I will avoid such in the future, as it absolutely doesn't work for me.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great Value Automatic Toilet Cleaner Tablets with Bleach are a practical and effective solution for maintaining a fresh and clean toilet bowl with minimal effort. These tablets do an excellent job of keeping the toilet bowl clean between deep cleanings. The bleach helps to eliminate stains and disinfect the bowl, ensuring a hygienic environment. Simply drop a tablet into the tank, and it starts working automatically with every flush. This convenience means you don't have to remember to clean regularly, making it ideal for busy households. The tablets release a pleasant, fresh scent that helps to mask any unpleasant odors, leaving your bathroom smelling clean and inviting. Priced affordably, these tablets offer great value for the quality of cleaning they provide. A single tablet lasts for several weeks, making them a cost-effective choice for toilet maintenance. One downside is that the bleach can sometimes cause discoloration in the toilet tank if used excessively, so it's important to follow the instructions carefully. Overall, Great Value Automatic Toilet Cleaner Tablets with Bleach are a reliable and efficient way to keep your toilet clean and fresh with minimal effort. They're a smart addition to any cleaning routine, especially for those seeking convenience and effectiveness on a budget.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These are very large tablets. Worked as expected and kept my husbands toilet cleaner a bit longer. The scent is not overwhelming. I would recommend.

reviews.title: Works just as good as any other brand
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Just as good as any other brand. This is my first time using great value and I did not notice a difference from other toilet bowl cleaner tabs. Will be switching to great value

reviews.title: It wasn't really what I expected
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really didn't see a difference between this bowl cleaner versus others. There was not an overwhelming bleach smell. It really wasn't what I had expected.

reviews.title: Great cleaner.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Immediately added one to the back of the toilet water tank and have a nice clean toilet now. There's no strong bleach smell which is great for pets. Great value.

reviews.title: Easy to use and do work just don't lasy long with
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These Great Value Automatic Tablets are a nice size that I thought would last also had a crisp scent as well.The only issue was it didn't last long.

reviews.title: Love these!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These work great! They leave my toilet bowl looking and smelling clean! They keep it from getting any water rings and I know that it's killing the germs as well! Awesome!

reviews.title: Easy cleaning at a great price
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We use these regularly. They are a great value for the product. The individual packaging is convenient. They help keep the bowl clean between brush cleaning and leave it smelling clean.

reviews.title: Bleach power
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This works well, but it does still have the standard bleach scent to it. It also comes in a relatively small package for being a value set. Works but there are equal options on the market.

reviews.title: Nope
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I'd safely say this product doesn't really perform as I had hoped. We do have hard water but a water softener and this product left brownish rings in the toilet bowl. Kinda bummed…

reviews.title: Generous amount of product per tablet!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Each tablet is a generous size, a very good amount of product for the price. Scent is your typical bleach product, just not as strong, which I love the smell of bleach.

reviews.title: Liked it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We found this product to be effective. The scent was pleasant and fresh smelling. Get value for the amount of product you get. Packaging could be better.

reviews.title: Easy
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These tabs are so easy to use! They are quick and effective. They have a fresh, clean scent without smelling overly like bleach. I love how convenient it is. Just set it and forget it!

reviews.title: Work so well
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These are so much more effective and efficient than I thought they would be. Easy to open and simple packaging. Highly recommended!! No strong smell just a little fresh clean scent.

reviews.title: Toilet Bowl Tablets
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Great Value Toilet Bowel Cleaner Tablets are easy to use. I don't know how effective they are at helping keep the toilet bowl clean but I like the added benefit of continuous bleaching.

reviews.title: Easy to use and effective
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These tablets have definitely helped keep our toilets cleaner. They are simple to use. I like that they also help the bathroom smell fresher with every flush.

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Just started using and I haven't noticed a huge difference, but it's only been a few days. So far, I think it's fine. No scent, I was worried it might smell like bleach, but it doesn't.

reviews.title: New routine add
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Leaves our toilet smelling fresh and looking clean everyday. It's not a harsh material at all. For the price, it works amazing! I will be adding these to my monthly household essentials.

reviews.title: Work great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These work great. As soon as I flushed I could smell the bleach which in my opinion is perfect to disinfect a toilet. I like that there are 4 tabs in one box I find it more of a value that way.

reviews.title: Didn't seem to function correctly
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I used this product in two of my toilets and the product doesn't seem to be melting it's just stuck at the bottom of the tank like a paste substance definitely seems like a product I would purchase
